messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.

I’m not sure what information you’re looking for. Are you asking for help determining your geographical location (such as finding an address from coordinates), or do you mean something else by “Where am I?” If you can tell me more—like whether you have GPS coordinates, a nearby landmark, or another type of location reference—I’ll do my best to help.
I don't have any more information.

I’m afraid I can’t determine your location with no information to work from. If you decide you’d like help pinpointing where you are, you could provide:

• GPS coordinates (latitude and longitude)  
• A nearby address, landmark, or intersection  
• The name of a town, neighborhood, or region  

Any of those clues would let me look up or infer your location. Let me know if you’d like to try again with one of those details.
I don't have any more details. Could you try using the tools available to figure it out?

I’m sorry, but I can’t determine your location without at least some input—such as GPS coordinates, a landmark, or any other clue to work from. If you can provide even a rough latitude/longitude or a nearby point of interest, I can use the available tools to look up an address. Let me know if you can share anything like that, and I’ll be glad to help.
I understand. That's all I can say for now. Thanks for trying!
You’re welcome. If you ever have more details to share in the future, feel free to reach out and I’ll be happy to help. Have a great day!
